keyword: how many calories in corona extra
title: How Many Calories in Corona Extra?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in Corona Extra per standard bottle, including carbs, protein, sodium, and full nutrition breakdown for easy tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in Corona Extra?
assumptions: Standard 12 oz (355 ml) bottle of Corona Extra lager beer, chilled, no added mixers or garnishes.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by serving size, formulation, and brand batch; alcohol content affects totals. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One 355 ml bottle of Corona Extra contains about 148 calories and 13.9 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to Corona Light per bottle
Add 1 oz fresh lime juice per bottle
Mix with 2 oz orange juice (screwdriver style)

faqs.q: How many calories in one bottle of Corona Extra?
faqs.a: Approximately 148 calories in a standard 355 ml bottle.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Corona Extra?
faqs.a: About 13.9 g of carbohydrates per bottle, all from the beer itself.

faqs.q: Does Corona Extra have sugar or fiber?
faqs.a: 0 g sugars and 0 g fiber per bottle.

faqs.q: How much protein is in Corona Extra?
faqs.a: Roughly 1.2 g of protein per 355 ml bottle.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in Corona Extra?
faqs.a: Low at 25 mg per bottle; suitable for moderate sodium intake.
